# Hexodus - GitHub Configuration

## Branch Protection Rules
- Require pull request reviews before merging
- Require status checks to pass before merging
- Require branches to be up to date before merging
- Restrict who can dismiss pull request reviews

## Code Review Guidelines
- All code changes must be reviewed by at least one other contributor
- Focus on functionality, security, and maintainability
- Ensure new features follow Material 3 Extended guidelines
- Verify proper error handling and edge case management

## Issue Templates
- Bug reports should include device model, Android version, and reproduction steps
- Feature requests should explain the use case and benefits
- Questions should be directed to discussions rather than issues

## Pull Request Guidelines
- Follow the existing code style and patterns
- Include tests for new functionality
- Update documentation as needed
- Reference related issues in the PR description
